![](mugs.jpg)

Finca brings coffee, culture, and cuisine to Madison's South Side. In addition to a modern take on Salvadoran coffee, they also offer an extensive menu of Latin food. Come join us for a delicious cup of coffee in a casual, modern café.

[Order online](https://www.clover.com/online-ordering/finca-coffee-llc-madison) ahead of time for quick pick up if that's your thing.

![Salvadoran Quesidillas are sweet corn cakes that are amazing with a cup of coffee.](quesidilla.jpg)

![Tacos pair well with coffee for breakfast. Who knew?](tacos.jpg)
